column3: Ah negative on that request commercial freighter Better tell the boss MarsCo went bellyup on the Dow Jones Yesterday We got the Network feed from Gateway it was the top story You win some you loose some No but I got something that might interest you A pair of incomings They poppedup on the mediumrange about thirteen Yeah Turns out they dropped straight out of hyperspace And if you thought that was interesting watch this We ran a trajectory simulation If they carry on along that path Seven minutes ago the third course change in an hour Those incomings Okay give me the numbers What do you need on the board Picking up velocity go along with that Rhinos look a little antsy Do you hear that I believe it Wait a minute The sealed from inside Doc in there and it sounds Oh my God Shit happening what How many of them are there It you uh move your ass gonna need a helluva diet Behind you too late Unconfirmed reports of eighteen or so far but the numbers are all over sealed but those boys are cutoff Not yet Thirty six hours not gonna make it are we Oh man Well what about those other things outside those warriors Maybe we Shut up York About thirty minutes Those are slimmeddown tanks so no stopping to dumped the whole database from one of the cleaning remotes into Tight We chose a route we felt would reduce the chance of you running All clear Are you alright up the Central Reservoir I found it Drains right into the Central Reservoir I reach her Too much signal breakup Hiroko Cassie But
